text: @RealCandaceO Since Covid-19 had a mucus buildup as a condition, I decided to start taking 1- Mucinex 600 mg once in the morning from the beginning. I saw no problem with this on a short time basis. I contacted my doctor and received his approval. I also now take 1- 1,000 mg Zinc Piconlinte.
